context.description: Non-identifiable contextual data related to a user's session

activity.description: Tracking user's activity and behavior on the site

demographics.description: Demographical information except for related to fianncials

financial.description: Income, tax brackets and/or other financial information except for purchasing methods

purchasing.description: Credit and debit card numbers, checks and/or other forms of payment

govid.description: Government identification for the user such as SSN, TIN and drivers license number

system.description: Information used to provide support, debug issues and maintain the site

research.description: Information used for research and development to improve the site

profiling.description: Information used to profile users to differences in site behavior

marketing.description: Information used by the company for marketing purposes

context.description: Information released to others within the context of the site

others.description: Information provided to other companies beyond the context of the site

public.description: Information released publicly outside the context of the site
